casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Keith Darnel LOUIS, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156785
COA: 339851 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 10, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because the defendant's motion for relief from judgment is prohibited by MCR 6.502(G). The motion for confession of error is DENIED.
